metadata.title: CVE-2021-47596 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:hns3: fix use-after-free bug in hclgevf_send_mbx_msg Currently, thehns3_remove function firstly uninstall client instance, and then uninstallacceletion engine device. The netdevice is freed in client instanceuninstall process, but acceletion engine device uninstall process still useit to trace runtime information. This causes a use after free problem. Sofixes it by check the instance register state to avoid use after free.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
